document.full_text: the first drug to help patients with advanced melanoma live longer won u.s. approval on friday, a major step in the fight against one of the deadliest types of cancer.
document.title: fda approves bristol-myers melanoma drug
lines_and_colors: the first drug to help patients with advanced melanoma live longer won u.s. approval on friday, a major step in the fight against one of the deadliest types of cancer.
